metadata.name: New Beginnings (Edition 2 of 500)
metadata.description:
Artist: Sebastian Tory-Pratt
Medium: Digital Collage
Year: 2018

Disparate pieces, carefully arranged, can become more than the sum of their parts. Teams of people, working in sync, can push each other further and faster in the creation of something new.

This is a limited edition digital artwork contained in a Codex Record ERC-721 token. Created in an edition of 500, this work is provably rare; owning the token proves authenticity.

Created exclusively for early users of Codex Viewer.

instagram.com/sebcreates
